message.body: What'd you end up doing?
Sorry sammy! I can't today because I have an microbio exam to study for!!
Hey! Sorry I had to emergency babysit yesterday. Xuan called me urgently in the morning because an inspector showed up at the salon. I was so tired and felt just as tired when I got home!
You pretty much said what I was thinking to do! It was wise and I think it's the thing to do.
Xuan actually mentioned on Wednesday about me babysitting on Friday. She wasn't sure.
So when he asked me, I said that my sister asked me to babysit tomorrow because I didn't want to give a "perhaps" impression and end up canceling or being late.
What threw me more however was what he wanted to do.
Like after I texted you that he asked if I was free tomorrow (Friday), I didn't answer right away and we got distracted.
I thought it was forgotten an we moved on.
However, he later sprung up the question asking if "I'm feeling French food and jazz bar tomorrow?"!
Okay, I would be okay with lunch because I get a friendly vibe from that.
And I would be comfortable with that because I was feeling like we got to that friendship zone.
But French food and jazz gives me a date-y vibe.
Is it just me?
But he was okay when I told him I was babysitting
Which I did end up doing.
I would totally go to Chipotle hahah.
At least you had an excuse although I'm sure it won't be the last time he asks.
Yeahhhhh....french food and jazz bar = date to me. Especially if it's just you two.
I honestly would be okay hanging out I think.
Just not that ^
Hahaha I found something and posted to your FB wall!
Pretty awesome!
Oh I saw it!! I told mike and he was like "pf course it's in London!"
It stood out to me because of what we were talking about the other night! Some of those theaters are freakin' cool. I want to sit in a boat to watch a movie.

I know!!! I do like the bed idea though I don't know how sanitary itd be!!!
But you believe that it's just platonic, go for it! See what happens.
Oh I did't even think of that. Yea I see it grossing someone out. Hopefully, they change the bed sheets often enough.
Yea, we be was going to ask me to go out for sushi and the game earlier. I already had plans. I would have been okay with that.
Okay. Well...good luck! Haha. What would you do if he does say something about wanting to be more than friends?
Coolio!!! I think it'll be okay!!
Hahah thanks. I would pretty much say what you said. That I'm more interested in being friends with him.
I hope it will be!
How goes the studying?
Not good. Not good at all.
I can imagine. Microbio. Fun stuff!
Still plenty of time :)
Yeah. I'm not too worried!!
There ya go!
#beastingit!
Haha. I like it!
